text: The Macedonian Translators Association (acronym MATA) is a professional association of translators based in Skopje, North Macedonia.MATA It has already held four international conferences.MATA Conference at SEEUMATA Fourth International Conference MATA is a partner organization with IAPTI.MATA-IAPTI Partnership ==References== Category:Translation associations Category:Professional associations based in North Macedonia Category:Organizations established in 2010
title: Macedonian Translators Association
